intro: Palicourea huigrensis, commonly known as Huigren's palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, elliptical fruits that are typically yellow when mature. Palicourea huigrensis is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
